name: Trump International Golf Links - Scotland
description: Trump International Golf Links, Scotland is a golf course in Balmedie, Aberdeenshire, Scotland, owned by Donald Trump. It opened in 2012. The Trump Organization is currently working on expanding the property.

familyMemberEthics.description: In 2017, Pres. Trump earned 3445724 in golf related revenue income from TRUMP INTERNATIONAL GOLF LINKS - SCOTLAND, valued at Over $50,000,000. Underlying Assets: golf course. Location: Aberdeen, Scotland. See attached schedule.
